verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I stand to praise You, but I fall on my knees.
My spirit is willing, but my flesh is so weak.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
So, light the fire (echo)
In my soul. (echo)
Fan the flame, (echo)
Make me whole. (make my spirit whole)
Lord, You know (echo)
Where I am, (where I've been)
So light the fire in my heart again.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I feel Your arms around me, as the power of your healing begins.
Your spirit moves right through me
like a mighty rushing wind.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines: So light the fire in my heart again.
